### Arctic Ocean

```{r, t_data_resource_arc, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}

df_tbl <- tibble(`Code` = c("AR", "GL", "CORA"),
                 `Filename` = c("netcdf_nrt_ar_2.parquet",
                                "netcdf_nrt_ar_gl_2.parquet",
                                "netcdf_cora_ar_2.parquet"),
                 Size = c("695.43 MB", "1.98 GB", "1.06 GB"),
                 `# Platforms` = c(190, 551, 736),
                 `# Profiles` = c(339751, 742809, 446321),
                 `# Observations` = c(87991564, 273695664, 127506287))

kbl_table(df_tbl) %>% kable_styling(font_size = 12)

```

:::
